page.title: 08VILLAGE GARTLY 2
page.content: The side of Park Lane nearer the river contains 7 detached bungalows.Of these 5 are privately owned factory built kit type houses,and 2 are owned by the Forestry Commission to house forestry workers. In a cul-de-sac by the station is another private house. The old station buildings still stand and are used by the Forestry Commission as a store (These were until just recently the head office for the Huntly district). The station yard is still used as a Forestry Commission store although it was sold by them earlier this year.
